Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India’s economy is resilient in the face of headwinds
Indian Economy.summary: The Reserve Bank of India’s latest report on the economy makes for a reassuring read. Given the trade uncertainty that prevails, though, the real test may lie ahead.

Indian Economy.title: Himanshu: Low inflation masks a growing problem of fruitless farming
Indian Economy.summary: Soft food prices have helped bring down retail and wholesale inflation in India, but this has meant even lower price realization for farm output. The interests of farmers are neglected too often under the country’s current political economy paradigm.

Indian Economy.title: Modi’s UK visit set to seal landmark FTA; PM Starmer calls it a ‘major win’
Indian Economy.summary: UK–India to sign landmark Free Trade Agreement: Tariffs slashed, £6 billion in investment, major boost for jobs, exports, whisky, autos, and clean energy access.

Indian Economy.title: Indo-UK trade pact to enable Indian financial services firms to expand their footprint in Britain
Indian Economy.summary: This investment pact has the potential to bring in new, innovative, competitive financial services, thereby benefitting customers of financial services and broader economy without compromising the stability of India’s financial services sector

Indian Economy.title: Some Canadian Leaders Want Thaw With China to Offset US Trade War
Indian Economy.summary: Some senior officials in Canada say it’s time to repair trade relations with China, arguing US tariff policy is pushing them to deal with Asia’s largest economy.

Banking & Finance.title: Tata Sons FY25 net profit and revenue slip amid challenging global macros
Banking & Finance.summary: Tata Sons’ FY25 profit fell 25% to ₹26,231 Cr; revenue down 11.5%. Company repaid all debt, ends year with ₹7,117 Cr cash. CIC registration surrendered to RBI.
